languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, повторяю: в сопредельных отсеках, не оборудованых герметизаторами, укрылись десятки офицеров. Если мы откроем шлюзы... они все погибнут вместе с ксеносом".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, повторяю: в сопредельных отсеках, не оборудованых герметизаторами, укрылись десятки офицеров. Если мы откроем шлюзы... они все погибнут вместе с ксеносом".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, повторяю: в сопредельных отсеках, не оборудованых герметизаторами, укрылись десятки офицеров. Если мы откроем шлюзы... они все погибнут вместе с ксеносом".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."
"Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."
"Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."
"Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."
"Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."

languages.text: “舰长大人，请允许我提醒您，相邻的船舱内还有几十名军官没有躲在气闸后面。如果我们打开气闸的话……他们会和那个异形一起丧命。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请允许我提醒您，相邻的船舱内还有几十名军官没有躲在气闸后面。如果我们打开气闸的话……他们会和那个异形一起丧命。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permettez-moi de vous répéter que des dizaines d'officiers se trouvent dans les compartiments adjacents et que ceux-ci ne sont pas hermétiquement clos. Si nous ouvrons les sas... ils mourront avec le xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permettez-moi de vous répéter que des dizaines d'officiers se trouvent dans les compartiments adjacents et que ceux-ci ne sont pas hermétiquement clos. Si nous ouvrons les sas... ils mourront avec le xénos. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, se lo repito: hay montones de oficiales en las salas adyacentes y estas no están herméticamente selladas. Si abrimos las esclusas... Morirán junto al xenos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, se lo repito: hay montones de oficiales en las salas adyacentes y estas no están herméticamente selladas. Si abrimos las esclusas... Morirán junto al xenos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、繰り返します。密閉されていない隣の部屋には、何十人もの士官がいます。エアロックを開ければ…彼らは異種族とともに死ぬでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、繰り返します。密閉されていない隣の部屋には、何十人もの士官がいます。エアロックを開ければ…彼らは異種族とともに死ぬでしょう」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich wiederhole, es befinden sich Dutzende von Offizieren in den angrenzenden Räumen, die nicht hermetisch abgeriegelt sind. Wenn wir die Schleusen öffnen ... Werden sie zusammen mit dem Xenos sterben."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich wiederhole, es befinden sich Dutzende von Offizieren in den angrenzenden Räumen, die nicht hermetisch abgeriegelt sind. Wenn wir die Schleusen öffnen ... Werden sie zusammen mit dem Xenos sterben."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, tekrar ediyorum: Bitişik kompartımanlarda onlarca subayımız var, odalar yalıtımlı değil. Hava kilitlerini açarsak... Zenoyla beraber onlar da ölür."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I repeat: there are dozens of officers in the adjacent rooms that are not hermetically sealed. If we open the airlocks... They are going to die along with the xenos."
